name: Chaos Runner
description:
Controls:

Move (the red square) using either the WASD or arrow keys

Criterion Name:Describe ImplementationEndless Runner



Hyperactivity




Happy




ChiptuneThe player must dodge the incoming
shapes endlessly while running to the right.

The player must react quickly to dodge the
incoming shapes. The game becomes more
and more chaotic as the walls start to close 
in.


The sounds played when collecting power-ups
are satisfying, as well as the background is 
colorful and happy



The music that plays during the game and the 
pickup sounds are 8 bit


All assets were created by me after the start of the game jam
